casebody.data:
The State ex rel. Scott, Appellant, v. Industrial Commission of Ohio, Appellee.

[Cite as State ex rel. Scott v. Indus. Comm., 98 Ohio St.3d 286, 2003-Ohio-371.]

(No. 2002-0899 Submitted January 7, 2003 Decided February 12, 2003.) Law Office of Thomas Tootle Co., L.P.A., and Thomas Tootle, for appellant.

{¶ 1} The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed consistent with the opinion of the court of appeals.

Moyer, C.J., Resnick, Pfeifer, Cook, Lundberg Stratton and O’Connor, JJ., concur. F.E. Sweeney, J., dissents. *287.Tim Petro, Attorney General, and Thomas L. Reitz, Assistant Attorney General, for appellee.
